content: the lazy waves shawlette is tiny it is dense and mildly textured made in a slow colour-change sock yarn it is perfect for using as a neckerchief depending on your personal gauge it can even be used as a small shawl i have supplied instructions for working out how much yarn you would need if you would like to adopt a more relaxed gauge i have also supplied instructions for if you would like to use more initial repeats to get a larger shawlette have fun dedri
